title: Northern Italy
description: From the top of the image we see the southern part of Lake Maggiore. Straddling the border of Italy’s Lombardy and Piedmont regions – with its northern end in Switzerland (not visible) – the lake covers an area of over 210 sq km.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
